name: Box stuffed bear with balloons
description: This box includes an adorable teddy bear huddled in premium decorative papers, accompanied by three metallic balloons

name: Bouquet of heart-shaped balloons
description: A spectacular bouquet of natural flowers composed of lilies, roses, and fresh foliage, accompanied by heart-shaped metallic balloons

name: Bouquet of seasonal flowers with a balloon
description: The bouquet is composed of an elegant combination of roses and lilies in soft tones, enhanced with fresh foliage and a fine white presentation paper with a ribbon bow

name: Bubble balloon and love teddy bear arrangement
description: This combo includes a bubble balloon with red and black confetti, held with satin ribbons like a hot air balloon, and at the base, an adorable brown teddy bear, all presented in a round box with a red bow

name: White heart box with imported red roses
description: Our “I Love You” Red Rose Box is made up of 12 roses imported from Ecuador, selected one by one for their beauty and freshness

name: Heart-shaped box with seasonal flowers and white roses
description: Our Assorted Heart Box combines the elegance of white lilies, the sweetness of pink roses imported from Ecuador, the charm of gerberas and the freshness of astromelias, creating a perfect harmony of color

name: Bouquet of yellow freesias with Korean paper
description: Bouquet of yellow freesias with Korean paper

name: Bouquet of alstroemeria flowers
description: Bouquet of astromelias in various colors
